alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Morgan County through 615 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chesterhill, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McConnelsville, Chesterhill, Malta, Stockport, Bristol and Hackney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio.
